item.title: About Chris Albon
item.description: I have spent over a decade applying statistical learning, artificial intelligence, and software engineering to political, social, and humanitarian efforts. I am the Director of Machine Learning at the Wikimedia Foundation. Previously, I was the Director of Data Science at Devoted Health, Director of Data Science at the Kenyan startup BRCK, cofounded the AI startup Yonder, created the data science podcast Partially Derivative, was the Director of Data Science at the humanitarian non-profit Ushahidi, and was the director of the low-resource technology governance project at FrontlineSMS.
